name: Fragmentary Apulian Red-Figure Calyx Krater (and detached foot fragment)
description: Fragmentary Apulian Red-Figure Calyx Krater (and detached foot fragment); Black Fury Group (Greek (Apulian), active early 300s B.C.); Apulia, South Italy; about 370 B.C.; Terracotta; 36.6 × 28.8 cm (14 7/16 × 11 5/16 in.); 77.AE.93; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Fragmentary Apulian Red-Figure Calyx Krater (and detached foot fragment)
